Package Environments

Class Forge

  • java.lang.Object
    • Environments.Forge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Forge
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Player can buy and repair items here. Forge inventory is refreshed after resting at inn.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Forge()
      This constructor creates forge loot table and generates forge inventory for the first tune.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void buyItem​(Mercenary customer, int itemID)
      This method makes the customer pay for picked item and equips the buyer with it.
      void generateInventory()
      Clears forge inventory, picks random items from forge loot table and adds them to forge inventory.
      void repairItem​(Mercenary customer, Item damagedItem)
      This method makes the customer pay for repairs and smith repairs the damaged item.

    • Method Detail

      • generateInventory

        public void generateInventory()
        Clears forge inventory, picks random items from forge loot table and adds them to forge inventory.

      • buyItem

        public void buyItem​(Mercenary customer,
                    int itemID)
        This method makes the customer pay for picked item and equips the buyer with it.
        Parameters:
        customer - Mercenary that is buying the item.
        itemID - Index of bought item.

      • repairItem

        public void repairItem​(Mercenary customer,
                       Item damagedItem)
        This method makes the customer pay for repairs and smith repairs the damaged item.
        Parameters:
        customer - Mercenary that is paying for repairs.
        damagedItem - Damaged item to be repaired.
